overview:
14 years of experience in application/protocol development for various wireless (2G/3G/4G LTE) wireline (IMS/SIP/VOIP), communication infrastructures and end user applications. • Self motivated • Presence infrastructure and its corresponding applications. • Highly skilled programming knowledge on Unix platforms (C, C++, JAVA) • Get it done attitude and thrive in experimental and new technologies. • Architecture/Design/Development of 5 9’s Reliable/Scalable/Distributed/Flexible systems. • Excellent communication skills • Mobile app development • Understanding Marketing needs and develop technology to meet market needs with in time and quality.

Specialties Wireless Networks(3G & LTE), Wireline Networks, IMS. Distributed systems. Architecture
